metadata.title: CVE-2023-35994 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple improper array index validation vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 tdelta functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the tdelta initialization part.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
